name: Time trouble!
description:
DISCLAIMER: Please play with mouse and keyboard and ignore some of the silly movement bugs - I'm too tired to fix them atm.

This was an under-16hrs "jam" style game I made for an assignment under the guidance of a very chill guy called Jocce Marklund - and yes, it's that guy, the one behind Necken and Tumble Jump (check those out on steam under Joccish :v)
